action_title: Cut trees and remove leaf litter
key_messages:
Key Messages:

One before-and-after trial in the NetherlandsÂ found that cutting trees and removing the litter layer increased the cover of two heather species and of three grass species.
background_information:
Background information and definitions:
This section considers the cutting of trees combined with removal of leaf litter. The cutting of trees may reduce their abundance while the removal of leaf litter may aid the propagation of shrubland plant species.
